welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wantagh, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer and hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, baggage claim, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is for private and charter flights and includes a lounge and customs services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest international terminal at JFK, serving airlines such as Air France, Japan Airlines, and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal serving Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at JFK, serving a variety of international and domestic airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The home of JetBlue Airways, offering a modern and spacious design.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: A popular terminal for British Airways, United Airlines, and other international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: The primary hub for American Airlines, with a variety of shops and restaurants.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with the option to upgrade to faster speeds for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
